bdi4jade.reasoning

Class DefaultDeliberationFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.reasoning.AbstractReasoningStrategy
      • bdi4jade.reasoning.DefaultDeliberationFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeliberationFunction, ReasoningStrategy

    public class DefaultDeliberationFunction
extends AbstractReasoningStrategy
implements DeliberationFunction
    This class is the default implementation of the strategy DeliberationFunction. It selects all intentions to be tried.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public java.util.Set<GoalUpdateSet.GoalDescription> filter(java.util.Set<GoalUpdateSet.GoalDescription> goals)
        This method selects all goals to become intentions. Therefore it returns a set including all goal passed as parameter.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface DeliberationFunction
        Parameters:
        goals - the list of current goals dispatched by the capability associated with this strategy.
        Returns:
        the list of selected goals (which are in the for of GoalUpdateSet.GoalDescription), which will become intentions.
        See Also:
        DeliberationFunction.filter(Set)
